nodes.body: {!header} May has been packed with hits ones after another! We started out with painting Plorps (link to pictures) and haven't slowed down with our Spring Jam (link to pictures) concluding this past week!
{ðŸ“… events} [Share & Play Q2](https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307697634/) @ Grand Glaize Library (Meeting Rm 2), June 7th
{ðŸ“… events} Dev Night Out @ Puttshack, June 21st at 6pm
{ðŸ“… events} GameDev Social @ Dirty 20, June 12th at 7pm
{ðŸ“… events} Game Club will be discussing _Baba is You_ @ Qdoba, [June 30th at 6:30pm](https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307697799/)
{ðŸ“¢ announcements} Playstation [showcased a deep dive](https://blog.playstation.com/2025/04/29/watch-the-borderlands-4-gameplay-deep-dive-state-of-play-on-april-30/) on the upcoming Borderlands 4!
{ðŸ“š resources} _Scottyp123_ made a cool [3D animation tool](https://mesh2motion.org/) similar to Mixamo
{ðŸŽ® releases} _Simple Pixel Games_ released [Word Scores](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3340020/Word_Scores/), a relaxing casual strategy word game, on Steam!

{ðŸŽ® releases} _Limebranch_ released [Missouri Riverbank Restorer](https://limebranch.itch.io/mrr) on itch.io! Learn about Missouri rivers and the native flora and fauna as you progress through several minigames!

events.title: Spring Game Jam
events.description:
Team up with local creators and make a game over a few weekends (and the week in between)! This jam will be mostly virtual. SIGN UP ON ITCH.IO!

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see:Â https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307433670/

events.title: Spring Jam Work Session 1
events.description:
The Spring Game Jam is virtual, but we decided to have an in-person get together anyway. Come hang out with fellow jammers and work on your games at the library!Â  We will be in Meeting Room 2.

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see:Â https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307748696/
events.location: St. Louis County Library Grand Glaize Branch  - 1010 Meramec Station Rd - Manchester, MO, us

events.title: Game Audio Club
events.description:
If youâ€™re into making video game music or sound design (or just curious) come hang out with us once a month! Doesnâ€™t matter if youâ€™re a pro or just starting outâ€” everyoneâ€™s welcome. Just bring your love for game audio.
Weâ€™re a chill group where you can share your work, get feedback, or just vibe with people who love game audio.

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see:Â https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307433670/

events.title: Game Club: Baba Is You
events.description:
Game Club is like a book club except we pick a game to play each month and then meet up to discuss it with a focus on game design. This month's game is Baba Is You, a brilliant puzzle game! Come share your thoughts on the game with us!

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see:Â https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307697799/
events.location: QDOBA Mexican Eats, 766 N New Ballas Rd, Creve Coeur, MO 63141, USA

events.title: Spring Jam Work Session 2
events.description:
The Spring Game Jam is virtual, but we decided to have an in-person get together anyway. Come hang out with fellow jammers and work on your games at the library! We will be in Meeting Room 2.

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see:Â https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307824136/
events.location: St. Louis County Library Grand Glaize Branch  - 1010 Meramec Station Rd - Manchester, MO, us

events.title: Spring Jam Game Demos
events.description: Spring Jam game demos will be streamed live online on our Twitch channel

events.title: Share & Play
events.description:
Join us for casual game testing! This is an opportunity for developers to share their progress, observe playtesting, and get feedback on their projects, and for local game enthusiasts to get their hands on new games, prototypes, and give helpful feedback. We will be in Meeting Room 2 in the library.

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307697634/
events.location: St. Louis County Libraryâ€“Grand Glaize Branch, 1010 Meramec Station Road, Manchester, MO 63021, USA
